titles: Devol's last farewel: containing an account of many frolicksom intreigues [sic] and notorius robbers  which he committed: concluding with his mournful lamentation, on the day of his death. To the tune of, Upon the change.
notes: Date of publication taken from Wing (2nd ed.)
Reproduction of originals in: University of Glasgow Library and British Library.
keywords: Duval, Claude, 1643-1670 --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
